alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 3:23PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, southeastern Gadsden and south central Leon Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 323 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Midway to 6 miles southwest of Tallahassee Comm College to near Crawfordville to 13 miles west of St. Marks. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marks, Woodville, Tallahassee, Crawfordville, Midway, Florida State University, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Lake Bradford, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Wakulla Springs, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Eight Mile Pond, Tallahassee Mall and Bethel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
